LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Armiman.label: Armiman
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Armiman.description: A technically matured military combat synth, capable of being compatible with most human equipment and operating heavy weapons. Although this technology was leaked from the colonial fleet, strangely they did not seem to invest it in their colonization activities.
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Armiman.tools.head.label: head
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Armiman.tools.left_fist.label: left fist
LanguageData.DMS_Mech_Armiman.tools.right_fist.label: right fist
